title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Systematic Literature Review Design for Open, Distance, and Digital Education (ODDE)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain the research design process for systematic reviews (SR) in ODDE by applying the PRISMA guidelines
Learners can apply methods to evaluate quality indicators of ODDE-related SR studies using meta-analysis tools
Learners can comparatively analyze research trends across core ODDE topics such as online learning effectiveness, AI education integration, and learning design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
